sentence.text: Recently, loss-of-function mutations in positive regulation of retrograde protein transport, ER to cytosol were reported in association with severe developmental delay, deafness and dystonia.

entity.text: positive regulation of retrograde protein transport, ER to cytosol

sentence.text: Remarkably, a patient with an isolated deletion at the 3'-end of creatine transmembrane transport had a similar severe phenotype as seen in positive regulation of retrograde protein transport, ER to cytosol deficiency but without deafness.

entity.text: positive regulation of retrograde protein transport, ER to cytosol
